SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_POKEDEX_NUMBER.title: Pokédex number
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_POKEDEX_NUMBER.description: Search by number to show all the Pokémon matching that Pokédex number. For example, searching for 25 will show all the Pikachu in your list

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_NAME.title: Name
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_NAME.description: Search by the Pokémon name. For example, searching Pikachu will show all the Pikachu in your Pokémon list

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_REGION.title: Region
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_REGION.description: Search for Pokémon from a certain region (kanto, johto, hoenn, ...)

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_FORM.title: Form
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_FORM.description: Add % before alola or galar to to show any Alolan or Galar Pokémon in your list

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_EVENT.title: Event
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_EVENT.description: Search for Pokémon that had a special event related to them (Community Day, Raid Day, ...)

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_GENDER.title: Gender
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_GENDER.description: Search for Pokémon that have that gender (male, female, genderless)

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_FILTERS.title: Keywords
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_FILTERS.description: Search by some keywords like <strong>costume, regional, shadow, purified, exclusive, tradable, deployable, transferable, evolve, tradeevolve, itemevolve, baby, legendary, mythical, starter, fossil, pseudo-legendary, ultrabeast<strong>

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_GENERATION.title: Generation
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_GENERATION.description: Add gen before the number of a generation to show all Pokémon of that generation. You can also select a range of generations with the character '-' (gen2-3, gen1-4, ...)

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_HAVING.title: Have/!Have
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_HAVING.description: Search have to show all Pokémon that you have at least one shiny. The opposite !have search will show the list of Pokémon that you don't have

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_TYPE.title: Pokémon Type
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_TYPE.description: Enter a Pokémon type to show all Pokemon that match that type. For example, searching for grass will show all grass-type Pokémon in your list

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_FAMILY_NAME.title: Evolutionary family
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_FAMILY_NAME.description: Add + before a Pokémon’s name. For example, searching for +Pikachu will show any Pichu, Pikachu, and Raichu in your list

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_FAMILY_NUMBER.title: Evolutionary family (with Pokédex number)
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_FAMILY_NUMBER.description: Add + before a Pokémon’s Pokédex number. For example, searching for +25 will show any Pichu, Pikachu, and Raichu in your list

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_POKEDEX_NUMBER_RANGE.title: Pokédex number range
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_POKEDEX_NUMBER_RANGE.description: Type -10 to find all your Pokémon with Pokédex number equal to or less than 10 or type 10- to find all your Pokémon with Pokédex number equal to or higher than 10. You can also type 10-20 to find all your Pokémon with Pokédex number between 10 and 20

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_QUANTITY.title: Quantity
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_QUANTITY.description: Type quantity5 to find all Pokémon that you have 2 shiny. Also you can type quantity5- to find the Pokémon that you have less or equal than 5 shiny or type quantity5- to find the Pokémon that you have at least 5 shiny. You can also type quantity5-7 to find the Pokémon that you have between 5 and 7 shiny

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_YEAR.title: Year/YearPokemon/YearShiny
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_YEAR.description: Search for Pokémon that was released or that had its shiny released on that year (Year2017, YearPokemon2018, YearShiny2019, ...). You can also select a range of released Pokémon with the character '-'. (Year2017-2018, YearPokemon2018-2019, YearShiny2019-2021, ...)

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_SECOND_ID.description: Search Pokémon that have secondary IDs (26#61, #31, ...)

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_MOVE.title: @moves
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_MOVE.description: Search for Pokémon that can learn a certain move (@charm, @frenzy plant, ...). You can also use numbers after the character '@' to select the type of move (@1charm, @2frenzy plant, ...)

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_MOVE_THIRD.title: @move/@3move
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_MOVE_THIRD.description: Search for Pokémon that can have a 3rd move/2nd charge move

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_MOVE_SPECIAL.title: @special
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_MOVE_SPECIAL.description: Search for Pokémon that have Exclusive or Legacy moves. You can also use numbers after the character '@' to select the type of move (@1special, @2special, @3special)

SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_MOVE_TYPE.title: @type
SEARCH_POKEMON_BY_MOVE_TYPE.description: Search for Pokémon that have moves with a certain type (@fire, @dragon, ...). You can also use numbers after the character '@' to select the type of move (@1fire, @2dragon, ...)
